product_name: Marmot Reactor Fleece Hoodie Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: When you're moving fast yet still need a lightweight layer for warmth, wear the men's Marmot Reactor Fleece Hoodie Jacket made with Polartec(R). Polartec(R) Classic 100 microfleece is lightweight and breathable, perfect for trail running, backpacking and biking. Angel-Wing Movement(TM) allows nonbinding, full-range motion. Interior zippered pocket has a headphone port. Sleeve and handwarmer pockets are bonded for strength. Marmot Reactor Fleece Hoodie Jacket for men features flatlock seams that won't irritate skin. Elastic-bound cuffs and elastic drawcord hem seal in warmth. Closeout.
short_description: When you're moving fast yet still need a lightweight layer for warmth, wear the men's Marmot Reactor Fleece Hoodie Jacket made with Polartec(R).
